Model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Class handling the transactions and movement of its instances in a master Game object. Objects of this type move along a Board instance during application run and can buy, pay rent on, and trade objects of type OwnableSpace with each other.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(int nPlayerNum)
        Constructor for a Player object with nPlayerNum as parameter. For easier accessing of elements in a Game's playerList attribute, the nPlayerNum parameter (in this constructor) and attribute (in this class) will be in the range of 0-3, inclusive, depending on the number of players in the Game

        At instantiation, all attribute of this class are already given values except for dWorth, which will be calculated only at Game termination, and the ArrayList attributes that are only instantiated as such.

        Parameters:
        nPlayerNum - Integer holding the initial position of a Player in a Game's playerList attribute.

    • Method Detail

      • movePlayer

        public boolean movePlayer(Board board,
                          int numSteps,
                          boolean willCollectOnStart,
                          Bank bank)
        Player moving method that changes the nLocationIndex attribute of that object. Further actions will also be done dependent on the boardSpaces index that is traversed and landed upon method execution.
        Parameters:
        board - Board object on which the movement will be done.
        numSteps - Integer that holds the number of steps that the Player should "take".
        willCollectOnStart - Boolean variable that determines whether or not the active Player's dCash attribute will be increased by 200 upon passing index 0 of boardSpaces.
        bank - Bank object from which 200 will be deducted if the Player passes index 0 of boardSpaces and willCollectOnStart is set to true.
        Returns:
        Boolean variable that is set to false if, after the movement, the dValue attribute of the bank parameter is reduced to at most 0. True, otherwise.

      • isPaymentPossible

        public boolean isPaymentPossible(double dToPay)
        Checks for difference in dCash and a certain value. Returns whether or not an instance of Player will not be bankrupt after payment.
        Parameters:
        dToPay - Double-precision floating point number that holds the amount that is to be paid.
        Returns:
        Boolean variable the is set to false if the instance is able to pay without its dCash being reduced to at most 0. True, otherwise.

      • payPlayer

        public void payPlayer(double dToPay,
                      Player playerPayee)
        Player payment method. Reduces the dCash attribute of one Player instance while increasing another's.
        Parameters:
        dToPay - Double-precision floating point number that holds the amount that is to be transferred.
        playerPayee - Player object whose dCash will be increased.

      • payBank

        public void payBank(double dToPay,
                    Bank bank)
        Bank payment method. Reduces the dCash attribute of one Player instance while increasing the dValue of a Bank object.
        Parameters:
        dToPay - Double-precision floating point number that holds the amount that is to be transferred.
        bank - Bank object whose dValue will be increased.

      • buyProperty

        public void buyProperty(OwnableSpace currSpace,
                        Bank bank)
        Adds currSpace to the Player's ownedSpaces attribute. Simulates a purchasing action wherein a Player pays the bank the amount corresponding to the PRICE attribute of the currSpace parameter.
        Parameters:
        currSpace - OwnableSpace object that will be bought by the active Player instance.
        bank - Bank object that will collect the payment for purchase.

      • developProperty

        public void developProperty(Property toDevelop,
                            Bank bank)
        Increases the dRent and nDevelopment attributes of toDevelop. Simulates a development action wherein a Player pays the bank the amount corresponding to the HOUSE_PRICE attribute of the currSpace parameter.
        Parameters:
        toDevelop - Property object that will developed by the active Player instance.
        bank - Bank object that will collect the payment for development.

      • tradeProperty

        public void tradeProperty(OwnableSpace playerSpace,
                          OwnableSpace otherSpace,
                          Player otherPlayer)
        Exchanges the owner attributes of two OwnableSpace instances.
        Parameters:
        playerSpace - OwnableSpace instance that will be given to otherPlayer.
        otherSpace - OwnableSpace instance that will be given to the active Player.
        otherPlayer - Player instance that will partake in the trade.

      • isTypeComplete

        public boolean isTypeComplete(int nType)
        Checks for completion of OwnableSpace sets. This method is used when checking for the possibility of Game termination.
        Parameters:
        nType - Integer holding the value of the set to be checked.
        Returns:
        Boolean variable that is false if the set to be checked is incomplete. True, otherwise.

      • addOrDeductCash

        public void addOrDeductCash(double dToAdd)
        Equivalent setter method for the dCash attribute of this class. Instead of changing the entire value, a certain amount is either added or deducted to that attribute.
        Parameters:
        dToAdd - Double-precision floating point number that is to be added to the dCash attribute of an instance. The caller of this function sets this parameter negative for value deduction.

      • addSpaceOwned

        public void addSpaceOwned(OwnableSpace toAdd)
        Equivalent setter method for the ownedSpaces attribute of this class. Instead of changing the entire collection, a new instance of OwnableSpace is just added.
        Parameters:
        toAdd - OwnableSpace object that is to be added.

      • removeSpaceOwned

        public void removeSpaceOwned(OwnableSpace toRemove)
        Equivalent setter method for the ownedSpaces attribute of this class. Instead of changing the entire collection, an instance of OwnableSpace is just removed.
        Parameters:
        toRemove - OwnableSpace object that is to be removed.

      • addJailChance

        public void addJailChance(CardGroup1 toAdd)
        Equivalent setter method for the jailChanceCards attribute of this class. Instead of changing the entire collection, a new instance of CardGroup1 is just added.
        Parameters:
        toAdd - CardGroup1 object that is to be added.

      • removeJailChance

        public void removeJailChance()
        Equivalent setter method for the jailChanceCards attribute of this class. Instead of changing the entire collection, the top instance of CardGroup1 in the collection is just removed.
